articles.title: Instacart’s AI-driven pricing tool attracted attention — now the FTC has questions
articles.description: In an economy where everyone's feeling squeezed, AI-driven price testing of kitchen essentials was bound to attract attention.
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Adobe hit with proposed class-action, accused of misusing authors’ work in AI training
articles.description: The lawsuit is just the latest in a string of copyright-related legal complaints aimed at the AI industry.
articles.author: Lucas Ropek
